description: [Tomiris](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0671) has connected to a signalization server that provides a URL and port, and then [Tomiris](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0671) sends a GET request to that URL to establish C2.(Citation: Kaspersky Tomiris Sep 2021)

external_references.description: Kwiatkoswki, I. and Delcher, P. (2021, September 29). DarkHalo After SolarWinds: the Tomiris connection. Retrieved December 27, 2021.
